The little girl was alive.
I could have saved her. I left her with the nurse.
translation.fr: J'aurais pu la sauver. Je l'ai laissée avec l'infirmière.

translation.en: We were supposed to meet at the garrison, but there was an explosion.
translation.fr: Nous devions nous retrouver à la garnison. Mais il y a eu une explosion.

translation.en: I… I didn't think I could tend to you both.
translation.fr: Et je ne pensais pas pouvoir m'occuper de vous deux.

translation.en: I'm a soldier, Peter.
What do I know about an infant?
translation.fr: Je ne pouvais pas m'occuper d'un bébé.

translation.en: We make these decisions
in war, in life.
translation.fr: pendant la guerre, dans la vie.

translation.en: We have only a moment.
translation.fr: Et il faut les prendre vite.

translation.en: I could have saved you both.
I didn't.
And I lied
because I didn't want to cause you any more pain.
translation.fr: parce que je ne voulais pas que tu souffres davantage.

translation.en: Oh, I'm so sorry.
Sir…
did you see her dead?
translation.fr: est-ce que vous l'avez vue morte ?

translation.en: My sister?
No.
Then anything is possible.
Well…
you spoke of impossible elephants…
and were correct.
Sir?
You stood before an impossible opponent…
translation.fr: Tu t'es battu contre un soldat redoutable,

translation.en: and you were victorious.
Then today…
…I saw you fly!
It's you, my boy.
You.
You are what is possible.
translation.fr: C'est toi qui rends tout possible.

translation.en: One more task tomorrow.
Well, then, tell me a joke.
A horse walked into a bar. Um, maybe it can't walk into it.
translation.fr: Un cheval rentre dans un bar. Et il se cogne ?

translation.en: No, no! That's not funny.
- No. -
Oh, yes.
Yes!
Yes, that is funny!
Madam LaVaughn,
I've lied to you.
Finally, an admission.
No, I didn't mean to hurt you or make an elephant appear,
translation.fr: Je ne voulais pas vous blesser, ni faire apparaître une éléphante,

translation.en: but I wasn't trying for a bouquet of lilies either.
When I stood on that stage facing all of you,
translation.fr: Quand je me tenais sur cette scène,

translation.en: your disbelief…
…it… it made my heart break.
translation.fr: a brisé mon cœur en mille morceaux.

translation.en: Even now, you see magic right before you, things conjured from nothing.
translation.fr: La magie est tout autour de vous. Des êtres sont apparus comme par magie.

translation.en: Granted, a fractured magic, sloppy, accidental, but…
translation.fr: D'accord, c'est une magie instable, un peu bâclée, accidentelle,

translation.en: magic.
To which you respond, Stop, as you would to some minor nuisance.
translation.fr: Vous voulez que j'arrête, comme si c'était une nuisance.

translation.en: What has happened here?
That night, I tried to cast a spell on you and everyone else there.
translation.fr: Ce soir-là, j'ai voulu jeter un sort sur tout le monde

translation.en: A spell to make you believe again,
translation.fr: pour que vous retrouviez la foi

translation.en: to care about magic, because extraordinary things are possible.
translation.fr: et que vous croyiez en la magie. Les choses extraordinaires sont possibles

translation.en: If you believe!
But I had no business attempting such a powerful spell,
translation.fr: Mais je n'aurais pas dû tenter un sort aussi puissant,

translation.en: because I'm not a very good magician.
translation.fr: car je suis un mauvais magicien.

translation.en: I tried for mystery and wonderment.
It brought disaster.
- - I know.
I know you're worried about the Countess laughing, but I've got a great joke.
translation.fr: Tu t'inquiètes pour l'épreuve, mais j'ai une super blague.

translation.en: And I've got it under control. You gotta trust me.
Hey!
I feel like you're not taking me seriously. I'm a dangerous man.
translation.fr: Tu me prends pas au sérieux ? Je suis dangereux.

translation.en: - I beat a giant, I jumped off a building. -
translation.fr: J'ai battu un géant, sauté dans le vide.

translation.en: Okay, okay. There'll be plenty of time for messing about later.
translation.fr: Oui, d'accord. On aura le temps de jouer plus tard.

translation.en: We just have to concentrate on the final task, but…
translation.fr: On doit se concentrer sur la dernière épreuve, mais…

translation.en: Oh, I can't wait to get you out of here.
translation.fr: J'ai hâte de te sortir d'ici.

translation.en: We're gonna have so much fun and so many adventures…
translation.fr: On s'amusera comme des fous et on vivra plein d'aventures…

translation.en: …finding my sister.
Is this your family?
Peter!
Peter! - Peter! Peter! Peter! -
Peter.
Hey, wake up. It's time now.
Everyone's here, Peter. The third task.
translation.fr: Tout le monde est là. La troisième épreuve.

translation.en: Well, this should be interesting.
You must really miss them. I thought you were taking me back to my family.
translation.fr: Ils doivent te manquer. Tu devais me mener à ma famille…

translation.en: I need to get you back to yours.
translation.fr: mais tu as besoin de la tienne.

translation.en: It's time for the third impossible task!
translation.fr: C'est l'heure de la troisième épreuve impossible !

translation.en: Will the kid finally win the elephant?
translation.fr: Le garçon va-t-il enfin gagner l'éléphante ?

translation.en: Yes, I will.
Now, if at any point I hear the Countess laugh, you walk away with the elephant.
translation.fr: Si j'entends la comtesse rire, tu repars avec l'éléphante.

translation.en: Proceed.
So, there's a farmer and a fisherman.
translation.fr: C'est l'histoire d'un fermier et d'un pêcheur.

translation.en: - They're out in a field together. - Solid start. Classic.
translation.fr: - Ils marchent dans un champ. - Bon début.

translation.en: When they hear a funny kind of croaking noise, they look over towards the pond and they see a hen.
translation.fr: Soudain, ils entendent coasser. Ils se tournent et voient une poule.

translation.en: The hen's got this piece of string,
translation.fr: Elle tient un bout de ficelle

translation.en: and she's working the string in and out of the mouth of a frog by the pond,
translation.fr: et le fait glisser dans la bouche d'une grenouille.

translation.en: up and down with the string in the frog's mouth.
translation.fr: De droite à gauche et de haut en bas.

translation.en: So, the fisherman says, Why do you think the hen's doing that?
translation.fr: Le pêcheur dit : Pourquoi la poule fait-elle ça ?

translation.en: The farmer turns to the fisherman and says,
Well, sure, it's the same question as always, isn't it?
translation.fr: Eh bien, c'est la question qu'on se pose tous.

translation.en: Why did the chicken floss the toad?
Nailed it! Funny stuff, Peter! Funny stuff!
Oh, I get it.
Why did the chicken-- ? Because it sounds like…
translation.fr: La poule est-elle… Parce qu'elle est en train de…

translation.en: Hold on. Hold on. That's not a real laugh.
translation.fr: Une seconde ! Ce n'est pas un rire sincère.

translation.en: If you're not gonna take this seriously, Countess, then what's the point?
translation.fr: Si vous ne prenez pas ça au sérieux, à quoi ça rime ?

translation.en: Sorry, kid, you failed.
No.
What? No?
You have to let me take her,
but not for me, for her.
translation.fr: Laissez-moi l'emmener. Pas pour moi. Pour elle.

translation.en: All this time, I've tried to win the elephant to find my family,
translation.fr: Au départ, je voulais la gagner pour retrouver ma famille.

translation.en: but she has a family and she was taken from them.
translation.fr: Elle aussi a une famille, et ils ont été séparés.

translation.en: Peter, what about your sister?
The elephant might have a sister too. Why is mine more important?
translation.fr: Elle aussi a peut-être une sœur. La mienne est-elle plus importante ?

translation.en: I know the joke didn't work,
but please, the elephant didn't ask to be brought here.
translation.fr: mais l'éléphante n'a jamais demandé à être ici.

translation.en: We have to send her home.
No, no, no, no, no, no.
Man, you almost had me. But no.
translation.fr: Tu as failli m'avoir. Mais non.

translation.en: You had one last thing to do, and I don't see her laughing.
translation.fr: Tu devais réussir cette épreuve et je ne vois pas la comtesse rire.

translation.en: Grab the elephant and we'll roll.
No! No! No!
Okay, I know. This is impossible.
But what if it wasn't?
translation.fr: Et si ça ne l'était pas ?

translation.en: Just think for a moment.
Think of all of the impossible things you've done,
translation.fr: Des choses impossibles que vous avez faites.

translation.en: and you've probably done plenty.
translation.fr: Il y en a sûrement des tas.

translation.en: Have you ever gotten through one of them alone?
Of course not. That would be absurd.
translation.fr: Bien sûr que non ! Ce serait absurde.

translation.en: Peter fought and flew and defied a king,
translation.fr: Peter s'est battu et a défié un roi.

translation.en: - and maybe he feels alone. - But he's not.
translation.fr: Peut-être qu'il se sent seul. Mais il ne l'est pas.

translation.en: No one is. Remember that.
Oh no.
All right, kid, you did it.
What? Really? But… but it was the elephant.
translation.fr: Quoi ? C'est vrai ? Mais c'était grâce à elle !

translation.en: She's laughing, right? That's all I really wanted.
translation.fr: La comtesse a rigolé, non ? C'était mon souhait.

translation.en: Things are only impossible till they're not.
translation.fr: Les choses impossibles ne le sont pas toujours.

translation.en: The elephant is yours, Peter.
What?
Glorious victory! Huzzah!
Yeah! Woo- hoo!
Yeah!
We did it! We did it!
How will we get her home? A barge across the sea!
translation.fr: - Comment la ramener chez elle ? - Sur un bateau !

translation.en: A dirigible? Carried over the mountains by larger elephants!
translation.fr: - Avec un dirigeable ? - Sur le dos d'autres éléphants !

translation.en: That seemed good until I said it out loud.
- The Magician! -
- - Wake up now.
This boy says the elephant must go home. - You must make her disappear. -
translation.fr: L'éléphante doit rentrer chez elle. Vous devez la faire disparaître.

translation.en: You've seen what happens when I attempt that spell. We're lucky it wasn't worse.
translation.fr: Vous savez que ce sort est risqué. Ça aurait pu être bien pire.

translation.en: Sir, the elephant deserves to be with her family.
translation.fr: L'éléphante mérite de revoir sa famille.

translation.en: Yeah, that's a lovely idea, but look around you.
translation.fr: C'est adorable, mais regarde autour de toi.

translation.en: My magic is all failure! - Failure? - I can't do it!
translation.fr: Ma magie est un fiasco ! Je n'y arriverai pas.

translation.en: Nonsense!
- You brought an elephant through the roof. -
And don't you realize it started something here?
translation.fr: Et ne voyez-vous pas que cela a réveillé quelque chose ?

translation.en: The very thing you wished for.
Hey, magic man! Let's send the big lady home!
translation.fr: Hé, le magicien ! Renvoyez cette dame chez elle !

translation.en: I believe that you can perform the necessary magic.
translation.fr: Je crois que vous en êtes capable.

translation.en: I believe that only you can set things right.
Sister! Sister!
Sister, please.
In my dream, I was meant to follow her.
translation.fr: Dans mon rêve, je devais la suivre.

translation.en: I do not believe in dreams.
translation.fr: Je ne crois pas aux rêves.

translation.en: Yes, you do.
Yes, I do, in fact, believe in dreams.
translation.fr: Oui. Tu as raison, j'y crois.

translation.en: Oh, very well.
Developments are afoot.
The battle must be joined.
Hey, it's okay.
- - It's okay.
I heard it was different here before.
There was light, there was life, there was hope.
translation.fr: Il y avait de la lumière, de la vie et de l'espoir.

translation.en: The perfect kind of town to make an elephant disappear.
translation.fr: Une ville parfaite pour faire disparaître un éléphant.

translation.en: This is my home,
but it's not hers.
It's hard to lose a friend.
translation.fr: C'est dur de perdre une amie.

translation.en: We have to say goodbye now.
The Magician brought her here,
and I believe that he can send her home!
translation.fr: et je suis convaincu qu'il peut la renvoyer chez elle.

translation.en: Do you believe?
That is how it will be accomplished.
translation.fr: C'est grâce à ça que la magie fonctionne.

translation.en: Please, sir.
Belief is a great and invisible thing.
translation.fr: La foi est invisible mais puissante.

translation.en: It comes over us like sleep.
translation.fr: Elle nous envahit comme le sommeil.

translation.en: We struggle along the edges, fighting it for reasons we cannot name…
translation.fr: Nous la repoussons sans réellement savoir pourquoi.

translation.en: until, as with sleep, we lose ourselves.
translation.fr: Et alors que nous nous endormons, nous nous égarons.

translation.en: We stop… and we are restored.
translation.fr: Nous arrêtons de lutter… et nous renaissons.

translation.en: The elephant is gone!
I can't believe I just saw magic!
- What's happening? - Look at the clouds!
It's magic.
- It's clearing! -
- What is it? - It's sun, my darling.
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce que c'est ? - C'est le soleil.

translation.en: It's good.
- It's beautiful! -
Sunshine!
You were meant to follow her to your destiny.
translation.fr: Tu devais la suivre. C'était ton destin.

translation.en: This was more important.
Come on now, Adele. Time to go home.
translation.fr: Viens, Adele. On rentre à la maison.

translation.en: Sir, you're outside! - Yes. Yes.  -
translation.fr: - Sergent, vous êtes sorti ! - Oui, en effet.

translation.en: The soldier?
You were dead. You were dead.
Do you…?
Do you mean?
The boy!
This is… this is my sister.
- You're-- - Well…
- First of all-- Let me just say-- - You're alive! And here!
translation.fr: - Je voulais te dire… - Tu es en vie ! Tu es là !

translation.en: - - And family!
Come on, Peter!
Good stuff. Good stuff.
- Yeah! -
He found her!
Ow! What was that for? No more jumping off buildings!
translation.fr: - C'était quoi, ça ? - Ne saute plus jamais dans le vide !

translation.en: The magic worked!
I'm sorry for the harm I've caused you, madam.
translation.fr: Désolé pour le mal que je vous ai fait.

translation.en: I beg your forgiveness.
Oh, lilies!
Thank you, my friend.
Just look at the place now.
A town restored. Can you see?
translation.fr: La ville s'est réveillée. Vous voyez ?

translation.en: You've been visiting for a while.
translation.fr: - Vous êtes ici depuis longtemps. - Je sais.

translation.en: I know, but every time I try to leave,
translation.fr: - Vous êtes ici depuis longtemps. - Je sais. À chaque fois que j'essaye de partir, j'ai l'impression que c'est impossible.

translation.en: it just seems… impossible.
translation.fr: À chaque fois que j'essaye de partir, j'ai l'impression que c'est impossible.

translation.en: Just then, the magic coral woke up and chased the oysters away shouting--
translation.fr: C'est alors que le corail magique se réveilla et chassa les huîtres…

translation.en: - Begone, evil mollusks! -
Away!
- Ooh, that was really scary. - Thank you.
A whole family created.
How do you find exotic yarn? Oh, I've got my secrets, you know? I'm a big city lady.
translation.fr: - D'où vient cette laine ? - J'ai mes secrets. Je suis débrouillarde.

translation.en: Tell me you didn't make the goat more pajamas. All he does is eat them.
translation.fr: Encore un pyjama pour la chèvre ? - Elle les mange. - Oui, elle adore ça.

translation.en: Yes, but he likes eating pajamas.
translation.fr: - Elle les mange. - Oui, elle adore ça.

translation.en: Come on, while it's hot!
And as for the elephant,
she lives a really long time,
long enough to test even an elephant's memory.
translation.fr: Assez longue pour éprouver la mémoire d'un éléphant.

translation.en: But of course, she never forgets Peter.
translation.fr: Bien sûr… elle n'oublia jamais Peter.

translation.en: I mean, how could she?
